name: CONNECK
description:
This is the game that you only can play certain RPG's last boss battle.  

▶︎ Playing time about 10min - 20 min

Comments from developer :

 This is my first work and so excited to present it to the world. At the same time I am nervous about bugs as we all know the bugs are the most scary thing for the game. 

I have no friends who develope indie games and am not belong to any community so please follow my twitter. I would like to make friends through my games. I am not good at English so I would appriciate if you can send me DMs with easy English. Thank you very much.

OSUSHI : @osushidream
